messages.subject: Re: Northeast Unschooling Conference 2009 addition
messages.msgSnippet: In my addled state, I neglected to say WHERE it was going to be. (Thanks to the person who pointed that out!) I am pleased to announce that there will be a
messages.messageBody:
In my addled state, I neglected to say WHERE it was going to be. (Thanks to
the person who pointed that out!)


I am pleased to announce that there will be a 2009 Northeast Unschooling
Conference. It'll take place August 27-30, 2009 at the Sheraton Colonial Hotel
in Wakefield, Massschusetts, just north of Boston. Yep, we're adding another
day! We'll also have a brand new location with lots of space and amenities
(Huge health club with Olympic sized pool and tennis courts, free Internet in
conference attendee rooms, and lots more).

I'll have more details for you soon, but I wanted to make sure people got it
into their calendars. The new web site will be up soon, assuming strange
things don't happen.

Kathryn Baptista, running through that Who-What-Where-When-Why thing.
Obviously the How is eluding her right now
